description:
Hyper-V Driver does not check whether it can live migrate instances to the given destination [1], meaning that all destinations are valid for the operation, including nodes which are not in the same Active Directory. Attempting to live migrate to another host in another AD will cause the operation to fail. [2]


[1] https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/virt/hyperv/livemigrationops.py#L119

[2] http://paste.openstack.org/show/406766/
title: Hyper-V: Driver does not check if live migration is possible to destination node
